website_summaries.verdict: Snug and cool, with an organic, durable feel of old-time favorites.
pros: Fits light and lasts longer than expected at its price point
Reviews also highlight the secure fit of this light glove that maintains its suppleness with extended use
cons: Actual fit may not be true to size

customer_reviews.title: Level A/Elite these gloves don't last super long but they never get that crunchy feeling
customer_reviews.text: Level A/Elite these gloves don't last super long but they never get that crunchy feeling, & for $5 how can you go wrong, I order about 20 to last me the entire year as to cut down on shipping cost,,, I'm 5,9 180lbs athletic and wear a size medium but can squeeze into a small if need be
customer_reviews.author: Seandavis007

customer_reviews.title: Exact Fit, Good Value
customer_reviews.text: This xlarge size glove is what I was looking for. I like the mesh back for ventilation. It fits snug, but not too snug. I just hope it doesn't shrink. It not only helps when I get too much sweat on my hand, but also as protection against blisters. I think that next time I will get the xxlarge just in case it eventually shrinks a bit. So far it has worked perfectly for me (used it in 3 matches so far) and I'm very satisfied with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Trotter

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and nice fittig
customer_reviews.text: Just started using this glove, about 1 hour, twice a week for the last 3 weeks. it is till holding. no complain at all yet. I have two other gloves I swapped with now and then so they can dry or I am not playing with a soaked glove so no idea when I would be able to give some useful information/review on this python vintage item. But I have used other gloves few dollars more expensive than this one that do not hold my grip as good.
customer_reviews.author: Leon N

customer_reviews.title: This works!
customer_reviews.text: The best glove I have tired. I play a lot of tennis in FL, find it hard to grip my racket in the heat. This is a durable and very comfortable glove. Much better than the expensive leather gloves I have bought before. The synthetic leather makes for a better grip, enhanced comfort and can wear throughout the game without changing - not like before.
customer_reviews.author: PMC

customer_reviews.title: 8.39?  Great deal.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for Pickleball. After a trip to walmart and seeing most gloves were $20+, I thought there had to be less costly gloves. Found this, took a chance and very impressed. I've worn it for a week and seems great. Keeps the sweat inside, and breathes from the top. It works. And for the price? Order three. For golf I wore a medium/large glove. This I ordered a large and it is snug. If you are a banana fingers person, go for the XL.
customer_reviews.author: The Rads

customer_reviews.title: I like them better than gloves that cost three times as ...
customer_reviews.text: I'll be ordering more of these. I like them better than gloves that cost three times as much. I've been using them for a month or so for about 6 hours per week and they are holding up well. At this price, I'd recommend giving them a try. I doubt I'll ever use another glove. Note: I have no connection to the company and receive no compensation. I'm just a racquetball player recommending a product that works well for me.
customer_reviews.author: DaveR

customer_reviews.title: Great glove and greater value!
customer_reviews.text: I play pickleball 2-3 hours a day 5-6 days a week in Florida. Cool days only 1 glove a day but in the summer, I have to rotate. Hot,humid days I can cycle thru 3 a session. Not the gloves fault ;-) These gloves fit and last!!! I rinse and dry these gloves and they still hold up and are soft to put on. I gave up leather gloves cause they got too crunchy to put on. Long as they fit right, I highly recommend these gloves
customer_reviews.author: R Davis

customer_reviews.title: I don't HATE it because I have won almost every game since ...
customer_reviews.text: Unhappy with this glove- It slips and, even though I ordered an extra small, there is space at the end of each of my fingers. The glove has a THICK velcro and plastic wrist closure making it very difficult to secure my racquet handle slip string. I have to either tape it closed with electrical tape or use a very strong hair band to secure it. I don't HATE it because I have won almost every game since I found a way to secure it. I prefer to have a smaller glove but I can't find any ANYWHERE. Where do the pros go?
customer_reviews.author: michelle green

customer_reviews.title: Buy a better glove
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, this glove is inferior to the other python gloves I've used and even at this price it isnt worth buying. I put it on for my first game, hands were dry and was quite disappointed to find it slips on my fingers so the racquet twists noticeably. The fit was not the issue as the size matched my hand well.
customer_reviews.author: Tanner Vincent

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly nice glove, especially for the money!
customer_reviews.text: The fit, tackiness and apparent durability (after only a few uses) are all distinctively positive aspects of this glove. This is especially true given the reasonable price. The feel is not quite as soft and form-fitting as I usually like, but that is overshadowed by the other fine features.
customer_reviews.author: Barry

customer_reviews.title: very bad glove
customer_reviews.text: I've been playing squash for a long time -- and have used many brands of glove, synthetic and leather. This is -- by a wide margin -- the worst I have ever used. It fits well -- but as soon as I begin to sweat, my hand begins to slip. It feels like I'm wearing one of those rubber gloves you use for washing dishes.
customer_reviews.author: HDB III

customer_reviews.title: Great Glove for the Occasional Player
customer_reviews.text: This is a good entry level glove. Offers good grip and comfort, but do not expect to get a lot of longevity out of this glove. For a few dollars more, you can get the Python leather one that has much better grip and durability.
customer_reviews.author: Wolfsatz Domain

customer_reviews.title: They feel kind of like dish washing gloves as its made out of a ...
customer_reviews.text: Avid player for years. The first thing I noticed on the gloves is that they run a little big. Having to return these due to size. They feel kind of like dish washing gloves as its made out of a rubbery synthetic material. It feels grippy which is good; I cant seem to gauge the durability potential without actually playing with it on. Its an unusually light glove as you will notice. Better review coming upon receiving the correct size.
customer_reviews.author: William Tosonowsky

customer_reviews.title: Good Glove and Washable
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a glove that helped my grip for Pickleball, and that was washable. This glove works on both fronts. The dark marks from my racket grip did not wash out in the washing machine, but the glove emerged unscathed and fresh-smelling. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: GeographicAli

customer_reviews.title: Great glove for the price
customer_reviews.text: I have only played with this glove twice as of now but so far I like it. For the price it is. a good glove. It feels a little thin which makes me wonder how long it will last. Also there is no extra padding on the back side of the glove or on the palm like some of the nicer gloves have but you get what you pay for right. Grip is good and fit was good also. Purchased the large and it fits just right.
customer_reviews.author: USU Aggie

customer_reviews.title: Best garden cloves ever
customer_reviews.text: I do a lot of extreme gardening often in a muddy environment. These gloves cover my iWatch which is very important to me. Easy to clean by soaking in warm sudsy water. Stand up to lots of heavy use.
customer_reviews.author: bbg1

customer_reviews.title: This glove is comfortable and doesn't get stiff!
customer_reviews.text: This glove is comfortable and doesn't get stiff from sweat. I am not sure about the durability as I have only used it twice so far, though it seems to be a glove that will last.
customer_reviews.author: nark

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding value
customer_reviews.text: I was concerned that these gloves may not hold up because they are less expensive than most alternatives. However, they haven't shown any signs of wear besides some slight discoloration on the palm which is unavoidable. The grip is outstanding and having tried more expensive gloves from some of my friends I really couldn't justify spending more money when this glove is an option. Sizing seems to run as described.
customer_reviews.author: Zachary judson

customer_reviews.title: Snug fit with good grip!
customer_reviews.text: I prefer to wear my gloves TIGHT. This glove tends to lean on the tighter side (obviously this is subjective based on my hands...), but I like my gripping ability!
customer_reviews.author: R. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Glove definitely has grip. I bought 3. First ...
customer_reviews.text: Glove definitely has grip. I bought 3. First one lasted about 6 games before there was a hole in the palm. Using the second now and it has lasted about 10 games so far.
customer_reviews.author: Brad

customer_reviews.title: wrong photo / description
customer_reviews.text: tricks you into buying item you will never use and TOO hard to return thru kohls. our time is valuable -- encourage your family/friends to boycot Selectively
customer_reviews.author: L. Alan Aber

customer_reviews.title: Great glove for the $$
customer_reviews.text: I have big hands and was worried a 2XL would be too small. Its snug but fits well. To new to comment on durability yet but seems like it will be fine. I have used it 2X. I bought a second one at same time because the price was good.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Smells like sour milk
customer_reviews.text: Lasted about 2 months of playing pickle ball before it started to stink. Smells like sour milk. Don't know if its the material or what. It is durable though and hasn't shown any signs of wear. I actually bought another since I liked it so much.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Fits like a Second skin
customer_reviews.text: This glove is as good if not better than any other leather glove I’ve used , I’m very pleased with this product My racquet stays firm in hand
customer_reviews.author: Highlanderone

customer_reviews.title: Great Product and Great Value
customer_reviews.text: What can I say? It fit like a glove!! Good price , fast shipment, exactly what I was looking for. I use it on my non dominant hand, to minimize physical contact in these Pandemic times.
customer_reviews.author: Michael L. Rosen

customer_reviews.title: Great Grip, Poor Quality Synthetic Material
customer_reviews.text: I played about 10 games before the synthetic leather on the thumb started to peel off. It has great grip and great airflow with the mesh back, but the material should have lasted longer than 10 games. My last Head glove lasted over 200 games before it started to wear.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler

customer_reviews.title: No durability issues with mine.
customer_reviews.text: I was concerned about the durability of these after reading some other reviews, but so far they have held up quite nicely and are very comfortable. I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Grognak Volpe

customer_reviews.title: well-made, not durable
customer_reviews.text: No assembly or fit issues, but the thumb is almost worn through after less than 2 months' worth of play and the palm isn't far behind. Amazingly cheap, but I think it'd be worth it to get higher-quality material.
customer_reviews.author: Peter V. Cardi

customer_reviews.title: Great glove for the money
customer_reviews.text: very comfortable. the seem on the little finger started to split on second time wearing it. wife sewed it back up and seems to be holding fine now. to me the true test in a glove is how it holds up. The brand I bought for years did not hold up very well at all. Too early to tell about this one
customer_reviews.author: Don Webster

customer_reviews.title: I like the feel of it
customer_reviews.text: I like the feel of it. It is a bit tight but not uncomfortable. I ordered a Medium. Based on other reviews, I put it on and take it off very "gingerly" to avoid tearing it at the wrist. So far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Pickleball Al

customer_reviews.title: Worth it, but not perfect.
customer_reviews.text: Good price. Great, snug fit for me. Using it for tennis in hot and very muggy SC. At some point during a match, I felt the glove squirming around on my hand effectively changing the angle of my racket head mid-stroke.
customer_reviews.author: P. T. Waite

customer_reviews.title: I've now had three of these. The first one ...
customer_reviews.text: I've now had three of these. The first one lasted as long as a name brand glove. The 2nd one tore on a seam within two times of playing. The third one had the palm tear within a month
customer_reviews.author: T. Sears

customer_reviews.title: Nice but shrinks
customer_reviews.text: The glove fit well and was comfortable on the first two wearings. After that, the glove shrank and would no longer fit. I guess I should’ve ordered a larger size.
customer_reviews.author: nrgolden

customer_reviews.title: Durable and Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: My husband uses the glove for Pickleball. This is his second purchase. He said it’s very comfortable, the first glove held up well — was very durable — and you can’t beat the price.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl P Quintal

customer_reviews.title: The smallest XL
customer_reviews.text: The XL does not fit like an XL. Fits like a large. I did use it, but I also purchased another XL glove from Big-5.
customer_reviews.author: S Brown

customer_reviews.title: Nicely Fulfilled My Purpose For Buying
customer_reviews.text: Use this glove for pickleball and so far I like it. As I just started using it, I can't rate it for durability.
customer_reviews.author: El Puma

customer_reviews.title: Left handed racquetball gloves
customer_reviews.text: These gloves are great. I have a really hard time finding left handed small racquetball gloves so I was happy with this purchase and reasonable price. This is the second time I purchased these gloves and they are very durable.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Ferriola

customer_reviews.title: Not OJ's glove, but it fits like one!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome glove. Feels perfect and enhances grip. Everything you would want from a glove.
customer_reviews.author: Darkbull

customer_reviews.title: I’d buy it again
customer_reviews.text: Not a bad glove. Felt a bit slick at first, but once your hand warms up it grabbed a lot better. Material is of the quality you would expect for the price. Im a once a week player so excessive use/wear is not a concern for me. All in all decent glove for a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Foshag

customer_reviews.title: Just OK
customer_reviews.text: Glove was just OK. When my hand started sweating, it was difficult to hold the racquet. Wish the grip was better.
customer_reviews.author: dicemanaj

customer_reviews.title: Check the inside of the glove before wearing.
customer_reviews.text: I searched for women's pickleball gloves. When I ordered this glove I assumed it was for women. I ordered a medium and after wearing it a couple of times, I checked the inside of the glove and discovered it was actually a men's medium. Do not include men's glove when someone searches for women's. I am very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Szuch

customer_reviews.title: Grip
customer_reviews.text: Glove has good fit and gives me the non slip grip that I needed. Good buy.
customer_reviews.author: William K.

customer_reviews.title: decent glove but the seams wear out quickly
customer_reviews.text: The glove fits well but wears out quickly at the seams. I used one about 5 times and the seams at the thumb unraveled. For the price it's a decent glove, but doesn't seem to last as well as most of the others.
customer_reviews.author: ken

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected for the price
customer_reviews.text: No complaints. Have played pickleball aggressively for about 5 hours. No signs of wear yet. Good grip. Great value.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Solid glove
customer_reviews.text: The feel is good while playing. Good grip, fits nicely and looks great. Wasn't expecting much because of the price but it was a good buy. I am an intermediate racquetball player so I haven't tried high end gloves but this works great for me.
customer_reviews.author: gilbert

customer_reviews.title: Nice Glove - Needs more Tackiness
customer_reviews.text: The glove works well. I found the fit slightly larger than other gloves. The tackiness is not as good as some of the others I have played with. I like that fact that this glove is very light and you barely know you have it on.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Richard

customer_reviews.title: Won't rip easily like leather gloves do
customer_reviews.text: Very good tactile feel without ripping this summer. And doesn't absorb sweat during 2-3 hours of play. Recommend this glove.
customer_reviews.author: David - Colorado Springs

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: The glove is solid but no better or worse than the others I have tried. Value is what sells this product.
customer_reviews.author: GK Value Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Pickleball
customer_reviews.text: I use them for pickleball. They are great for warm weather play.
customer_reviews.author: B. Barnett

customer_reviews.title: Great "splat" for your buck!!
customer_reviews.text: Great "splat" for your buck!! I was hesitant to order because of the low price. But I have been playing with it for 2 weeks now, and its a solid glove. Better than many that cost twice as much. Will re-order in the near future.
customer_reviews.author: Samsung S20 DTX

customer_reviews.title: Use with light grips!
customer_reviews.text: Nice grip and fit (use Ektelon Size chart), the only thing I don't like is that the sowing leaves a mark on my hand. Also, the palm part can get easily stained, especially with dark grips. I'll keep buying them as long as I have a light colored (or silicone) grip on my racquetmainly because there aren't many vegan options.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Good glove, failed me though
customer_reviews.text: I was 10 games behind in my local league this fall until I bought this glove. After losing my first game with it I won the next two. Never got caught up to the leader and it definitely has to be the gloves fault, can’t imagine it was my physical ability!
customer_reviews.author: SuburbanParent

customer_reviews.title: Good gloves
customer_reviews.text: I bought 4 of these gloves and have used them for a couple months now. They are very nice gloves, fit is good and provides a solid grip. I am a low B player and will buy more of these gloves when I need too.
customer_reviews.author: Emily P

customer_reviews.title: Slippery , will ruin your shots
customer_reviews.text: These are by far the worst gloves I’ve ever used. Not worth 8 cents much less $8. The synthetic palm is like a banana peel. Raquet slips and slides on every hit. The black on black for $15 is 1000x better by same brand. Don’t get this, trust me
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Also great for golf
customer_reviews.text: Use these for golf and love the durability and fit. Will buy more as needed.
customer_reviews.author: JT

customer_reviews.title: Use on my blocker hand in ice hockey
customer_reviews.text: I have a bit of a skin problem on my hands and it would get irritated when I played hockey (goaltender). I wear this on my blocker hand and no problems. Very durable and breathable for synthetic.
customer_reviews.author: M. E. Donnelly

customer_reviews.title: So far .. excellent!
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent glove for the money. The only question is whether it's going to hold up, and I believe it will.
customer_reviews.author: Just My Opinion

customer_reviews.title: Good glove
customer_reviews.text: We are novice racquetball players and started using this glove right away. I like it well enough and the price was good.
customer_reviews.author: Tutu Debbie

customer_reviews.title: What it is made of.
customer_reviews.text: I like glove but I am concerned if it will hold up to me.
customer_reviews.author: christopher spann

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable and secure
customer_reviews.text: Love my new glove I feel I have more control of my paddle and especially need it in high humidity
customer_reviews.author: Lori

customer_reviews.title: Great for the money
customer_reviews.text: Great for the money. Fits my hand a little larger than expected
customer_reviews.author: John Stein

customer_reviews.title: this was not one of python better gloves. It has a smooth palm and my ...
customer_reviews.text: this was not one of python better gloves. It has a smooth palm and my racquet moved in my hand a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Tuff

customer_reviews.title: It seems to run big even ordering a size down
customer_reviews.text: Fingers run big. I got a small. It serves the purpose of a glove requirement to play pickleball during this quarantine time.
customer_reviews.author: Sally M.

customer_reviews.title: Great glove for a fair price
customer_reviews.text: Works well, good fit only used it twice though. Does not get soaked so it wicks away sweat pretty well!
customer_reviews.author: John G

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product to use for pickleball. It is a quality product and I am sure it will work well for some. But for me personally it felt like it “muted” the feel of the paddle for those important placement shots. So I am not using it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: More like golf glove
customer_reviews.text: Really wasn't what I was looking for. This is more like a golf glove. I was looking with a glove with a textured palm for a better grip. Totally my fault for not reading description better.
customer_reviews.author: Gail

customer_reviews.title: these are the worst gloves I've ever had
customer_reviews.text: I have played racquetball for 35yrs at a high level, these are the worst gloves I've ever had. It's actually more slippery with the gloves than without.
customer_reviews.author: roger stern

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: The quality is OK. It does the job well however quality is not the highest.
customer_reviews.author: bumblebee

customer_reviews.title: Good glove at a good price
customer_reviews.text: Good glove at a good price. I'm a C level player and don't necessarily have a favorite glove yet. This now my go to glove and I've purchased a few more of them.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Love the glove
customer_reviews.text: As a 77 year old former racquetballer turned age-group Gold Medalist.pickleballer, I love the glove. After buying one, I ordered several more. You always have control of the racquet. They dry quickly. Note: order a size smaller than you normally wear for a snug fit.
customer_reviews.author: joel r

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: I’m a heavy sweater. This glove works well for a couple games and then it is too wet and slippery.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Nice glove
customer_reviews.text: Nice and airy mesh back helps hand not sweat so much
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan McCann

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: Been playing since 92 and think this is a great glove for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Great Glove for the Money
customer_reviews.text: Holds up well playing Pickleball with it. Lov Lov Lov it.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth Lang

customer_reviews.title: May not last but good price
customer_reviews.text: Good price but not sure how long it'll last. Thin material. Fits a bit big for woman.
customer_reviews.author: Patty Levin

customer_reviews.title: My wife is very happy with this glove
customer_reviews.text: My wife is very happy with this glove. She uses it to play pickle ball and it has helped her grip, especially when her palm gets a little sweaty.
customer_reviews.author: G. Lipsky

customer_reviews.title: but with a good grip on your racquet this glove still does its ...
customer_reviews.text: It is a synthetic leather and you can tell, but with a good grip on your racquet this glove still does its job and has a nice feel to it.
customer_reviews.author: AlreadyGQ

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality glove
customer_reviews.text: Poor quality! The thumb ripped after the first use. Beware of this glove.
customer_reviews.author: Charles  Masterson

customer_reviews.title: As advertised....
customer_reviews.text: If you're looking for a high end RB glove this is not high end...but it's great for what it is and is a good backup
customer_reviews.author: Ken Boltz

customer_reviews.title: Nice Grip
customer_reviews.text: Has a different feel than real leather and thinner, but nice grip.
customer_reviews.author: David M Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Repeat purchase
customer_reviews.text: First one lasted 14 months using it three mornings/week. Obviously, I liked it so I reordered.
customer_reviews.author: George G

customer_reviews.title: Good grip and cheap
customer_reviews.text: Great glove, maintains tacky feel for great grip. Wears out fairly fast. But these gloves are inexpensive so well worth it.
customer_reviews.author: R. Robbins

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: White surface of inner hand is rubbing off after a few uses. May return
customer_reviews.author: Minks

customer_reviews.title: Average quality and feel
customer_reviews.text: Average quality and feel. Will choose different glove after this one wears out since it isn't for my dominant hand.
customer_reviews.author: Zotikos

customer_reviews.title: gloves have a very good feel and I find that they grip the racquet ...
customer_reviews.text: gloves have a very good feel and I find that they grip the racquet better than all the other gloves I have
customer_reviews.author: dg

customer_reviews.title: Works like a champ
customer_reviews.text: After looking for the best the best value for money, these came out on top. Excellent fit. Fine tailoring, quick dry, all you could want for routine play.
customer_reviews.author: Sotto voce

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, price and fast shipping
customer_reviews.text: I borrowed this glove from my Racquetball partner. The glove fit perfect so I purchased two.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny Polanco

customer_reviews.title: Not a true fit
customer_reviews.text: 2XL is not very large . What do professionals players with big hands use ? I guess I’ll have to cut off the fingers to get a fit around the palm . I guess for the price it will be a throw away .
customer_reviews.author: Coop

customer_reviews.title: Okay so far
customer_reviews.text: Have used the gloves a few times so far. Don't keep your hands as dry as other gloves I have used, but still keeps a good grip.
customer_reviews.author: Gerry C

customer_reviews.title: Great fit!
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good glove. One of the best I have bought. Love the texture and fit! A great value !
customer_reviews.author: BOSS903

customer_reviews.title: Awesome glove fits perfectly the leather was in great shape ...
customer_reviews.text: Awesome glove fits perfectly the leather was in great shape holds my racket family I bought another one !
customer_reviews.author: AvantGarde

customer_reviews.title: The sizes run small.
customer_reviews.text: The sizes run small. Good thing I got an x-large because I heard they run small. A large, my regular size,would not have fit.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: They look & feel like golf gloves & work well not slippery during play
customer_reviews.author: Mary Ann Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Better than my leather glove.
customer_reviews.text: I wear this glove 3-4 times a week for Pickle Ball. I like the mesh upper for breath-ability. I've used it for months with no problems.
customer_reviews.author: Shellbell

customer_reviews.title: good for the price
customer_reviews.text: good for the price. fit is a little large. I usually wear size Large with Head and E force. This size large is a little big for me, not as tight as I like it. Only used it twice so far.
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Fits well. Helps grip the paddle better and therefor it helps you play better with feel.
customer_reviews.author: candelier

customer_reviews.title: GREAT GLOVE and 3 times the
customer_reviews.text: I play racquetball 4 days a week, wanted to get a few gloves...Didn't want to spend $20.00 bucks a piece for them. These exceed my expectation @ 4.95 each. I purchased 8 and so far have not worn through any of them. GREAT GLOVE and 3 times the price
customer_reviews.author: AZ Scott

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Inexpensive glove that works well for general play. Slips a bit too much for competitive play.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: Nice glove - good quality. XS size little big for kids
customer_reviews.text: great quality - little big for a 8-9 year old.
customer_reviews.author: jeff in beaverton

customer_reviews.title: Feels just as good as an expensive glove
customer_reviews.text: So far, just as good as an expensive glove. Feels great. If it lasts as long as one costing 3x as much I'll be very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher J. Sacksteder

product_meta.title: Python Vintage Synthetic Racquetball Glove
product_meta.description: New for 2015-2016. If you’re looking for that old synthetic feel or just want the most affordable racquetball glove in the game look no further.
feature_bullets: Elasticized network back for a snug fit and cool comfort
Supported 1 inch wide wrist elastic to prevent riding up
Durable synthetic leather for a long lasting grip
Lock stitched throughout for long wear
